{{Adaptation}} {{infobox character | people=[[Orcs|Orc]] | name=Fimbul | image=The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Fimbul.jpg | caption="Fimbul" from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position=Lieutenant | location=[[Weathertop]] and [[Lake-town]] | affiliation=[[Azog|Azog's pack]]
[[Dol Guldur|Orcs of Dol Guldur]] | language=[[Black Speech]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|2941}} | deathlocation=[[Lake-town]] | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height=169 cm The Hobbit Chronicles: Creatures and Characters | hair=Bald | eyes=Yellow | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Fimbul''' was a [[Orcs|Orc]] who was part of [[Azog|Azog's]] pack. Fimbul was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' film series]], where he was portrayed by [[Stephen Ure]], who also portrayed [[Grinnah]]. == History == When Azog had [[Yazneg]] killed for his failure to catch [[Thorin]] and his [[Thorin and Company|Company]] as they headed toward [[Rivendell]], Fimbul became Azog's new lieutenant.''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' Once [[Bolg]] took over the leadership of the pack when Azog was summoned back to [[Dol Guldur]] by the [[Sauron|Necromancer]], Fimbul continued to serve as lieutenant. When the pack finally caught up to the Company again in [[Lake-town]], he was the one who notified Bolg that Thorin and most of the Company had already gone. Almost immediately after that, a slain Orc fell into the boat that Fimbul was sitting in at that moment, launching him into the air, where he was then decapitated by [[Legolas]], who happened to be on the balcony of [[Bard|Bard's]] house at that very moment.''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' == Etymology == His name is old norse for "great" or "mighty".https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/fimbul- It could also be a reference to [[Golfimbul]]. {{References}} [[Category:Orcs from adaptations]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) characters]] [[fi:Fimbul (elokuvahahmo)]]
